String.string: Treat the nightmare fiend blood like it's poison.
We're close to figuring this whole thing out.
Kill {@creature:46#402#argonomorph nightmare fiends} in the {@Rgn:46011$$Raga Shadi Spire} of {@Rgn:46001$$the Three Towers} and collect their nightmare blood.
Deliver the collected nightmare blood to {@creature:246#1035$$Flinton}.
